doc.field: Church of Christ First Disciples Sunday School Secretary record
Church of Christ First Disciples Sunday School Secretary record
Church of Christ First Disciples Sunday School Secretary record, dated 1900 to 1901 and housed in a single hardbound volume.
Church of Christ First Disciples Sunday School Secretary record, dated 1900 to 1901 and housed in a single hardbound volume.

Church of Christ First Disciples Sunday School Secretary record, dated 1900 to 1901 and housed in a single hardbound volume. The record lists first and last names of Sunday School officers, teachers, and students, often with home addresses.
The Church of Christ First Disciples was organized in 1875 and was located on Sterling Place in Brooklyn.
Gift of Arnold Streep, date unknown.
